title: EON FONT
content:
Hi  
I would like to know what font the electricity company EON is using. Their website is [http://www.EON.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140503003217/http:/www.eon.com/ "http://www.EON.com")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140503003217im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EONtyp_6212.PNG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140503003217im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EONtyp2_4684.PNG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140503003217im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EONtyp3_4521.PNG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140503003217im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EONtyp4_4713.PNG)
author: HisTen

comments.content:
According to various PDF it is listed as assorted weights of Polo. Such as Polo11R-Buch, Polo22K-Leicht etc.

I suppose it must be custom.
[(GST) Polo](http://web.archive.org/web/20140503003217/http:/www.typemanufactur.com/Frameset_1.html) is a typeface by Georg Salden. Not custom at all.

Thank you very much for your reply's.  
Are there any fonts that are similar/look like GST Polo?

Thanks for the clarification Jan.

I'm afraid I jumped to conclusions after I couldn't find anything about it at the usual places. It is rather difficult to find out about isn't it?

Richard siad <cite>It is rather difficult to find out about isn’t it?</cite>

[Search typohile](http://web.archive.org/web/20140503003217/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20polo)!  
 [http://typophile.com/node/32095](http://web.archive.org/web/20140503003217/http:/typophile.com/node/32095 "http://typophile.com/node/32095")

Sorry, maybe I should have included a little smiley in my post. I was trying to be ironic (I think).

I'd found that post, after Jan's ID, and was trying to alude to that post and his search for more information only last year.
Don’t worry, Richard. It _is_ difficult to find out about GST Polo on the web. It can be purchased only from Georg Salden’s website. Actually, I hadn’t seen it for so long, I didn’t recognize it.
